changelogversion.changelogtext: Some of the changes require v1.1.0 of the MusicBee Plugin to work.
Refreshes the playlists along with the library data.
Sorting now starts only from the triple dash icon in the now playing.
Adds the option to enqueue all tracks and play the selected on the library track tab.
changelogversion.changelogbug: Fixes the library search collapse that did not work previously.
changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Reworks the default action option to affect only the track view.
changelogversion.changelogbug: Fixes the query for showing the albums of an artist.
changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Adds the option to show only album artists in the library view.
changelogversion.changelogbug: Fixes the tab colors in the Help screen.
Automatically scrolls to the playing track when entering the now playing screen.
Fixes an issue where the remote session volume slider wouldn't work.
Fixes the ordering of the Genres to alphabetical.
changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Adds fast scrolling to the library tabs.
Adds Play Now (Queue All) option for albums.

changelogversion.changelogbug: Fixes a crash with a null extras payload when updating the widget.
Fixes a crash with a null key event on the media intent handler.
Fixes an issue where the artist albums would not display properly.
Fixes an issue where the notification would not disappear on a connected wearable after closing MusicBee.
Fixes an issue where the volume control in the wearable notification would not work.
Fixes an issue where the temporary stop during track change would make the notification flicker.
Fixes an issue where exiting the application through an other than MainActivity would navigate to the main activity.
Adds a message on connection to inform the user in case an incompatible version of the plugin is used.
Fixes a potential crash caused by the progress updater

changelogversion.changelogtext: Changes minimum supported version to Android 4.1.x
Replaces previous startup dialogs with Change Log
changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Implements and optimizes a new library view
changelogversion.changelogtext: Uses new API to load covers.
Uses new API to load lyrics.
Users new API for Now Playing loading
changelogversion.changelogbug: Fixes an issue where the application would start automatically on device boot
Fixes an issue with the widgets that stopped to updateNotification after some time
changelogversion.changelogtext: Increases the timeout of the automatic discovery function
changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Adds extra actions on the Incoming call action [i](Stop and Pause along with Volume reduce)[/i]
Reworks the connection settings detection functionality. [i](If the network allows it the detection should happen automatically on the application startup)[/i]
changelogversion.changelogtext: Application now is written in Kotlin language
